name: Ninja Run (Sshekon)
description:
Run Ninja! Take control of this ninja as you work your way around falling daggers, deadly spikes, and the ocean floor below you. These levels will test your patience and your precision so be ready!

While art isn't really my strong suit, I've focused on the gameplay and the type of obstacles you will encounter. I wanted to capture the cool 8-bit platformer will still having the gruesome deaths in the same fashion.
